properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL BY
   M/V POLARCUS ALIMA TOWING 12 8100 METER
   LONG CABLES ALONG TRACKLINES BETWEEN:
   A. 04 MAR
      35-41.40S 051-15.83W AND 35-29.08S 051-34.82W.
   B. 04 MAR
      35-21.20S 051-27.17W AND 35-33.50S 051-08.18W.
   C. 04 MAR
      35-41.65S 051-16.08W AND 35-29.33S 051-35.07W.
   D. 05 MAR
      35-21.45S 051-27.42W AND 35-33.77S 051-08.43W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 697/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 06 MAR 17.
